name: Roadie
description:
The show must go on!

And it's up to you, the ROADIE, to keep the show alive by helping the band through the entire song, so the crowd of fans don't get upset! (or keep it rocking as long as you can in our Endless Mode! How long can you make it?)

This game started at the Ludum Dare 46, but, we were unable to finish it on time, so we decided to continue developing it for a little longer, as a really fun learning exercise.

We hope you all enjoy it!
